title: Google adds a ‘Twosday’ Easter egg to Search in celebration of the once-in-a-lifetime date
content:
“Twosday” is upon us. February 22, 2022 is a special date on the calendar, because its the one time we’ll see a date that acts as a complete palindrome in our lifetime, and to celebrate “Twosday,” Google has a special Easter egg in Search.

more…

The post Google adds a ‘Twosday’ Easter egg to Search in celebration of the once-in-a-lifetime date appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To celebrate the once-in-a-lifetime date, Google Search has added a special Easter egg for "Twosday," February 22, 2022.
